trans-unit.source: Provides the base class from which the classes that represent expression tree nodes are derived.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別，表示運算式樹狀架構節點的類別可由此基底類別衍生。

trans-unit.source: It also contains <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) factory methods to create the various node types.
trans-unit.target: 它也包含 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />) Factory 方法來建立各種節點類型。

trans-unit.source: This is an <see langword="abstract" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 這是 <see langword="abstract" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a block expression.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立區塊的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The block expression consists of two <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> objects and one <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression> object.
trans-unit.target: 區塊運算式包含兩個<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>物件和一個<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression>物件。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建構 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建構 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> to set as the node type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> 可設定為節點類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會從衍生類別中建構函式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The visitor to visit this node with.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽這個節點的造訪者。

trans-unit.source: Dispatches to the specific visit method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 分派給這個節點類型的特定造訪方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> calls the <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> 會呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />。

trans-unit.source: The result of visiting this node.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽這個節點的結果。

trans-unit.source: This default implementation for <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension> nodes calls <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個預設實作<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension>節點呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to call into a more specific method on a derived visitor class of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor> class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法來呼叫更特定類別上的方法在衍生的訪客的<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, it should still support unknown visitors by calling <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它應該仍然支援未知的訪客藉由呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表不含溢位檢查的算術加法運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表不含溢位檢查的算術加法運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載加法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that adds two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立將兩個整數相加的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The addition operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 Addition 運算子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表不含溢位檢查的算術加法運算。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載加法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the addition operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的加法運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an addition assignment operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示不含溢位檢查的加法指派運算。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an addition assignment operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示不含溢位檢查的加法指派運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that adds a value to an integer variable and then assigns the result of the operation to the variable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立將值加入整數變數，然後將作業的結果指派給變數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that has overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表包含溢位檢查的算術加法運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that has overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表包含溢位檢查的算術加法運算。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載加法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The addition operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 Addition 運算子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that has overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表包含溢位檢查的算術加法運算。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddChecked" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddChecked" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 作業的實作方法是選擇根據下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載加法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the addition operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的加法運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 運算的 <see langword="AND" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 運算的 <see langword="AND" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.And" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.And" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`AND`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為整數或布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的結果類型是預先定義之位元`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應的結果類型的預先定義的位元`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a logical AND operation on two Boolean values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立運算式，表示對兩個布林值的邏輯 AND 運算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義位元 <see langword="AND" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 運算的 <see langword="AND" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.And" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.And" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 作業的實作方法是選擇根據下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`AND`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為整數或布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的結果類型是預先定義之位元`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="AND" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.

trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`AND`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `AND` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 條件式`AND`運算子無法多載以 C# 或 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `AND` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 不過，條件式`AND`運算子會評估使用位元`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `AND` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用者定義的多載的位元`AND`運算子可以是這種節點類型的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別是布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，而且對應不可為 null 的型別等於對應的實作方法的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為相同的布林型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的條件式的結果型別`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至預先定義的條件式的結果型別`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that performs a logical AND operation on its two operands only if the first operand evaluates to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立運算式的執行邏輯和操作其兩個運算元只有當第一個運算元判斷值為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義位元 <see langword="AND" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 是不相同的布林類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="AND" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand is resolved to true.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，代表只在第一個運算元解析為 true 時才評估第二個運算元的條件 <see langword="AND" /> 運算。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AndAlso" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AndAlso" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 作業的實作方法是選擇根據下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`AND`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `AND` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 條件式`AND`運算子無法多載以 C# 或 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `AND` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 不過，條件式`AND`運算子會評估使用位元`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `AND` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用者定義的多載的位元`AND`運算子可以是這種節點類型的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別是布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.

trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，而且對應不可為 null 的型別等於對應的實作方法的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為相同的布林型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.

trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的條件式的結果型別`AND`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.

trans-unit.source: The expression that represents the array can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeMemberAccess%2A> method, or through <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 表示陣列的運算式可以使用來取得<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeMemberAccess%2A>方法，或透過<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何透過多維陣列中項目的值變更`ArrayAccess`方法。

trans-unit.source: An expression representing the array to index.
trans-unit.target: 表示要編制索引之陣列的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains expressions used to index the array.
trans-unit.target: 包含用於對陣列進行索引之運算式的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> to access an array.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> 以存取陣列。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The expression that represents the array can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeMemberAccess%2A> method, or through <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For multidimensional arrays, use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 對於多維陣列時，使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayAccess%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to change a value of an array element by using the `ArrayAccess` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何透過陣列元素的值變更`ArrayAccess`方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents applying an array index operator.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，表示套用陣列索引運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents applying an array index operator to an array of rank more than one.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表將陣列索引運算子套用到陣序規範大於 1 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Each element of `indexes` must have <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> equal to <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目`indexes`必須<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>等於<xref:System.Int32>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `array` must represent an array type whose rank matches the number of elements in `indexes`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`array`必須代表其次序符合中的項目數的陣列型別`indexes`。

trans-unit.source: If the rank of `array`.Type is 1, this method returns a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 如果的陣序`array`。類型為 1，則這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left%2A> property is set to `array` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right%2A> property is set to the single element of `indexes`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left%2A>屬性設定為`array`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right%2A>屬性設定為單一項目的`indexes`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> represents the element type of `array`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>代表的項目類型`array`。型別。

trans-unit.source: If the rank of `array`.Type is more than one, this method returns a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 如果的陣序`array`。類型為多個，則這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that describes the public instance method `Get` on the type represented by the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `array`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>描述的公用執行個體方法`Get`所代表的類型上<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayIndex%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29> method to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents indexing into a two-dimensional array.

trans-unit.source: `index` must represent an index of type <xref:System.Int32>.

trans-unit.source: The `Assign` expression copies a value for value types, and it copies a reference for reference types.
trans-unit.target: `Assign`運算式複製實值類型的值，而且會複製參考類型的參考。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents an assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立代表指派運算的運算式。

trans-unit.target: 建立代表成員初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property equal to.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" /> that represents the initialization of a field or property.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" />，代表初始化欄位或屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" /> that has <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.Assignment" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment.Expression" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.Assignment" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment.Expression" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `expression` must be assignable to the type represented by the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of `member`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`expression`必須可以指派給所代表的類型<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>屬性`member`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> or <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 或 <paramref name="expression" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> does not represent a field or property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 不代表欄位或屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The property represented by <paramref name="member" /> does not have a <see langword="set" /> accessor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 所表示的屬性沒有 <see langword="set" /> 存取子。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the type of the field or property that <paramref name="member" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 指派給 <paramref name="member" /> 代表的欄位或屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents a property accessor method.
trans-unit.target: 代表屬性存取子方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment.Expression" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" /> that represents the initialization of a member by using a property accessor method.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" />，代表使用屬性存取子方法初始化成員。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.Assignment" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property accessed in <paramref name="propertyAccessor" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.Assignment" />，並將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />，代表在 <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> 中存取的屬性，以及將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment.Expression" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `expression` must be assignable to the type represented by the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of the property accessed in `propertyAccessor`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`expression`必須可以指派給所代表的類型<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>屬性中存取屬性`propertyAccessor`。
