trans-unit.source: The value passed to the label upon jumping can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定跳躍時傳遞至標籤的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Break, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to <paramref name="target" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to <paramref name="type" />, and <paramref name="value" /> to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等於 Break、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="target" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="type" />，且包含在跳躍時傳遞至目標標籤的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that specifies the instance for an instance method call (pass <see langword="null" /> for a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，指定執行個體方法呼叫的執行個體 (對 <see langword="null" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="static" />) 方法會傳遞 <see langword="Shared" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a method that takes no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表呼叫不採用任何引數之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: To represent a call to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, pass in `null` for the `instance` parameter when you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要代表呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，請傳入`null`如`instance`時呼叫這個方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: If `method` represents an instance method, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `instance` must be assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`代表執行個體方法，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`instance`必須可以指派給所表示之方法的宣告型別`method`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>是空的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性所表示之方法的傳回型別等於`method`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that calls a method without arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立呼叫的方法沒有引數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="method" /> represents an instance method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，<paramref name="method" /> 則代表執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" />.Type 無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表之方法的宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the target method.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the call arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的集合，代表呼叫引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a static (Shared in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表呼叫靜態方法 (在 Visual Basic 中為共用方法)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第一個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表呼叫採用一個引數的 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中則為 <see langword="Shared" />) 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that calls a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立運算式，會呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 會採用一個引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />，代表 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中則為 <see langword="Shared" />) 方法，將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為與之相等。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合之 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method that has arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表呼叫有引數的 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中則為 <see langword="Shared" />) 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If `arguments` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`arguments`不`null`，它必須有相同數目的項目所表示之方法的參數數目為`method`。

trans-unit.source: Each element in `arguments` must not be `null` and must be assignable to the corresponding parameter of `method`, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: 在每個項目`arguments`不得`null`，而且必須是可指派給對應的參數`method`，可能之後*用引號括住*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當對應的方法參數的類型是項目會用引號括<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is empty if `arguments` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>是空的如果`arguments`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments`, some of which may be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就會包含相同項目，做為`arguments`，其中有些可能會加上引號。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等於所表示之方法的傳回型別`method`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in <paramref name="arguments" /> does not equal the number of parameters for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 中的項目數不等於 <paramref name="method" />所代表之方法的參數數目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more of the elements of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the corresponding parameter for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一或多個項目無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表之方法的對應參數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> property equal to (pass <see langword="null" /> for a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method).
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> (針對 <see langword="null" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="static" />) 方法傳遞 <see langword="Shared" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a method that takes arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表呼叫至採用引數之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: To represent a call to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, pass in `null` for the `instance` parameter when you call this method, or call <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要代表呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，請傳入`null`如`instance`參數時呼叫這個方法，或呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A>改為。

trans-unit.source: If `method` represents an instance method, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `instance` must be assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`代表執行個體方法，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`instance`必須可以指派給所表示之方法的宣告型別`method`。

trans-unit.source: If `arguments` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`arguments`不`null`，它必須有相同數目的項目所表示之方法的參數數目為`method`。

trans-unit.source: Each element in `arguments` must not be `null` and must be assignable to the corresponding parameter of `method`, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: 在每個項目`arguments`不得`null`，而且必須是可指派給對應的參數`method`，可能之後*用引號括住*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當對應的方法參數的類型是項目會用引號括<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is empty if `arguments` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>是空的如果`arguments`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments`, some of which may be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就會包含相同項目，做為`arguments`，其中有些可能會加上引號。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等於所表示之方法的傳回型別`method`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="method" /> represents an instance method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，<paramref name="method" /> 則代表執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" />.Type 無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表之方法的宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The number of elements in <paramref name="arguments" /> does not equal the number of parameters for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 中的項目數不等於 <paramref name="method" />所代表之方法的參數數目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more of the elements of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the corresponding parameter for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一或多個項目無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表之方法的對應參數。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，指定執行個體方法呼叫的執行個體 (對 <see langword="null" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="static" />) 方法會傳遞 <see langword="Shared" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合之 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.target: 建立代表呼叫至採用引數之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: To represent a call to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, pass in `null` for the `instance` parameter when you call this method, or call <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要代表呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，請傳入`null`如`instance`參數時呼叫這個方法，或呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A>改為。

trans-unit.source: If `method` represents an instance method, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `instance` must be assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`代表執行個體方法，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`instance`必須可以指派給所表示之方法的宣告型別`method`。

trans-unit.source: If `arguments` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`arguments`不`null`，它必須有相同數目的項目所表示之方法的參數數目為`method`。

trans-unit.source: Each element in `arguments` must not be `null` and must be assignable to the corresponding parameter of `method`, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: 在每個項目`arguments`不得`null`，而且必須是可指派給對應的參數`method`，可能之後*用引號括住*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當對應的方法參數的類型是項目會用引號括<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is empty if `arguments` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>是空的如果`arguments`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments`, some of which may be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就會包含相同項目，做為`arguments`，其中有些可能會加上引號。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等於所表示之方法的傳回型別`method`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="method" /> represents an instance method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，<paramref name="method" /> 則代表執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="arguments" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and one or more of its elements is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，且它的一或多個子項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" />.Type 無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表之方法的宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The number of elements in <paramref name="arguments" /> does not equal the number of parameters for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 中的項目數不等於 <paramref name="method" />所代表之方法的參數數目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more of the elements of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the corresponding parameter for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一或多個項目無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表之方法的對應參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第一個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第二個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a static method that takes two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表呼叫採用兩個引數的靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that specifies the instance for an instance call.
trans-unit.target: 為執行個體呼叫指定執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: (pass null for a static (Shared in Visual Basic) method).
trans-unit.target: (對靜態方法 (在 Visual Basic 中為共用方法) 傳遞 Null)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the target method.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第一個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第二個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a method that takes two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表呼叫採用兩個引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that calls an instance method that has two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立會呼叫執行個體方法，具有兩個引數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property value will be searched for a specific method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，將搜尋其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性值中的特定方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that specify the type parameters of the generic method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的陣列，這些物件可指定泛型方法的類型參數。

trans-unit.source: This argument should be null when methodName specifies a non-generic method.
trans-unit.target: 當 methodName 指定非泛型方法時，這個引數應該為 Null。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that represents the arguments to the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 物件的陣列，這個陣列代表方法的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a method by calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表透過呼叫適當的 Factory 方法來呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> property equal to <paramref name="instance" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the specified instance method, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> set to the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 屬性等於 <paramref name="instance" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 設定為代表指定執行個體方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 設定為指定的引數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method denoted by `methodName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等於所表示之方法的傳回型別`methodName`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" /> or <paramref name="methodName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 或 <paramref name="methodName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No method whose name is <paramref name="methodName" />, whose type parameters match <paramref name="typeArguments" />, and whose parameter types match <paramref name="arguments" /> is found in <paramref name="instance" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="methodName" />.Type 或其基底類型中找不到名稱為 <paramref name="typeArguments" />、其類型參數符合 <paramref name="arguments" />，且參數類型符合 <paramref name="instance" /> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-

More than one method whose name is <paramref name="methodName" />, whose type parameters match <paramref name="typeArguments" />, and whose parameter types match <paramref name="arguments" /> is found in <paramref name="instance" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="methodName" />.Type 或其基底類型中找到多個名稱為 <paramref name="typeArguments" />、類型參數符合 <paramref name="arguments" />，且參數類型符合 <paramref name="instance" /> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第一個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第二個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the third argument.
trans-unit.target: 表示第三個引數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a static method that takes three arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表呼叫採用三個引數的靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the type that contains the specified <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，指定包含所指定 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中則為 <see langword="Shared" />) 方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that specify the type parameters of the generic method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的陣列，這些物件可指定泛型方法的類型參數。

trans-unit.source: This argument should be null when methodName specifies a non-generic method.
trans-unit.target: 當 methodName 指定非泛型方法時，這個引數應該為 Null。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that represent the arguments to the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 物件的陣列，這個陣列代表方法的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method by calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，代表透過呼叫適當的 Factory 方法來呼叫 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中則為 <see langword="Shared" />) 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the specified <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> property set to the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />，代表指定的 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中則為 <see langword="Shared" />) 方法，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 屬性設定為指定的引數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method denoted by `methodName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等於所表示之方法的傳回型別`methodName`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="methodName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 或 <paramref name="methodName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No method whose name is <paramref name="methodName" />, whose type parameters match <paramref name="typeArguments" />, and whose parameter types match <paramref name="arguments" /> is found in <paramref name="type" /> or its base types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="methodName" /> 或其基底類型中找不到名稱為 <paramref name="typeArguments" />、類型參數符合 <paramref name="arguments" />，且參數類型符合 <paramref name="type" /> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a coalescing operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表聯合運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> is `null` and both <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> are set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>是`null`，兩者均<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is equal to the result type of the coalescing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性等於聯合運算的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Result Type
trans-unit.target: 結果類型

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the result type:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定的結果型別：

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type represents a nullable type and `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to the corresponding non-nullable type, the result type is the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。類型代表可為 null 的類型和`right`。類型是隱含地轉換成對應的非 null 的型別，結果型別是不可為 null 的對等`left`。型別。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to `left`.Type, the result type is `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`right`。類型可以隱含轉換成`left`。類型的結果型別是`left`。型別。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type is implicitly convertible to `right`.Type, the result type is `right`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果不可為 null 的對等`left`。類型可以隱含轉換成`right`。類型的結果型別是`right`。型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="left" /> does not represent a reference type or a nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性不表示參考類型或可為 Null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not convertible to each other.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 無法相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a coalescing operation, given a conversion function.
trans-unit.target: 指定轉換函式，建立代表聯合運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> is `null` and both <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> are set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>是`null`，兩者均<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> is equal to the result type of the coalescing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>等於聯合運算的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the result type:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定的結果型別：

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type represents a nullable type and `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to the corresponding non-nullable type, the result type is the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。類型代表可為 null 的類型和`right`。類型是隱含地轉換成對應的非 null 的型別，結果型別是不可為 null 的對等`left`。型別。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to `left`.Type, the result type is `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`right`。類型可以隱含轉換成`left`。類型的結果型別是`left`。型別。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type is implicitly convertible to `right`.Type, the result type is `right`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果不可為 null 的對等`left`。類型可以隱含轉換成`right`。類型的結果型別是`right`。型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not convertible to each other.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 無法相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="conversion" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="conversion" />.Type is a delegate type that does not take exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="conversion" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="conversion" />.Type 為委派類型，其採用的引數不是剛好一個。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="left" /> does not represent a reference type or a nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性不表示參考類型或可為 Null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="left" /> represents a type that is not assignable to the parameter type of the delegate type <paramref name="conversion" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性所表示的類型無法指派至委派類型 <paramref name="conversion" />.Type 的參數類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="right" /> is not equal to the return type of the delegate type <paramref name="conversion" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="right" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性不等於委派類型 <paramref name="conversion" />.Type 的傳回類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that represents a conditional statement.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `ifTrue`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression>等於<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`ifTrue`。

trans-unit.source: If the first argument evaluates to `true`, the second argument is executed; otherwise, the third argument is executed.

trans-unit.source: This method allows explicitly unifying the result type of the conditional expression in cases where the types of `ifTrue` and `ifFalse` expressions are not equal.

trans-unit.source: Types of both `ifTrue` and `ifFalse` must be implicitly reference assignable to the result type.

trans-unit.source: The `type` is allowed to be <xref:System.Void>.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`是使用者定義型別定義隱含或明確轉換運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示的運算子是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否則就是：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`代表數值或布林值類型或可為 null 或非可為 null 的列舉類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`參考型別且明確的 boxing、 unboxing，或參考轉換`expression`。若要輸入`type`、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作之方法的引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別是可指派給`type`，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: If one or both of `expression`.Type or `type` is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果一或兩個的`expression`。型別或`type`是 null 的實值類型，對應的非可為 null 的實值類型分別等於引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否則消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a type convertion operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立代表類型轉換作業的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No conversion operator is defined between <paramref name="expression" />.Type and <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 和 <paramref name="type" /> 之間未定義轉換運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation for which the implementing method is specified.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表轉換作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，此轉換作業已指定實作方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If method is not `null`, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法不`null`，它是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: It must represent a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 它必須代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 會採用一個引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`expression`。型別或`type`是使用者定義型別定義隱含或明確轉換運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示的運算子是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否則就是：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`代表數值或布林值類型或可為 null 或非可為 null 的列舉類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`參考型別且明確的 boxing、 unboxing，或參考轉換`expression`。若要輸入`type`、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作之方法的引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別是可指派給`type`，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: If either or both of `expression`.Type or `type` are a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一或兩者的`expression`。型別或`type`null 的實值類型和分別為相等的引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別對應的非可為 null 的實值類型，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否則消除節點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且其代表的方法傳回的是 <see langword="void" />，不是 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者使用的引數不是剛好一個。

trans-unit.source: No conversion operator is defined between <paramref name="expression" />.Type and <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 和 <paramref name="type" /> 之間未定義轉換運算子。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the argument type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表方法的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The return type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" /> is not assignable to <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 所代表方法的傳回類型無法指派給 <paramref name="type" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="expression" />.Type or <paramref name="type" /> is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type does not equal the argument type or the return type, respectively, of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 或 <paramref name="type" /> 是不可為 Null 的實值類型，且對應之不可為 Null 的實值類型不等於 <paramref name="method" /> 所表示之方法的引數類型或傳回類型。

trans-unit.source: More than one method that matches the <paramref name="method" /> description was found.
trans-unit.target: 已找到一個以上的方法符合 <paramref name="method" /> 說明。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation that throws an exception if the target type is overflowed.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表轉換作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />；若目標類型已溢位，此運算式便會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation that throws an exception if the target type is overflowed.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表轉換作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />；若目標類型已溢位，此運算式便會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ConvertChecked" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ConvertChecked" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`是使用者定義型別定義隱含或明確轉換運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示的運算子是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否則就是：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`代表數值或布林值類型或可為 null 或非可為 null 的列舉類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`參考型別且明確的 boxing、 unboxing，或參考轉換`expression`。若要輸入`type`、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.target: 如果任一或兩者的`expression`。型別或`type`null 的實值類型和分別為相等的引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別對應的非可為 null 的實值類型，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: No conversion operator is defined between <paramref name="expression" />.Type and <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 和 <paramref name="type" /> 之間未定義轉換運算子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation that throws an exception if the target type is overflowed and for which the implementing method is specified.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表轉換作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，如果目標類型已溢位，且已指定此作業的實作方法，則此作業會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If method is not `null`, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法不`null`，它是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: It must represent a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 它必須代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 會採用一個引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`expression`。型別或`type`是使用者定義型別定義隱含或明確轉換運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示的運算子是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否則就是：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`代表數值或布林值類型或可為 null 或非可為 null 的列舉類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`參考型別且明確的 boxing、 unboxing，或參考轉換`expression`。若要輸入`type`、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作之方法的引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別是可指派給`type`，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: If either or both of `expression`.Type or `type` are a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一或兩者的`expression`。型別或`type`null 的實值類型和分別為相等的引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別對應的非可為 null 的實值類型，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否則消除節點。
