trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，代表運算式遞減 1。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to decrement.
trans-unit.target: 要遞減的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the decrementing of the expression by 1.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，代表運算式遞減 1。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the decremented expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表遞減後運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: This expression is functional and does not change the value of the object passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算式會正常運作，不會變更物件傳遞給它的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that substracts 1 from a given value.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從指定的值建立該 substracts 1 的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to decrement.
trans-unit.target: 要遞減的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 表示實作方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the decrementing of the expression by 1.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，代表運算式遞減 1。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the decremented expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表遞減後運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: This expression is functional and does not change the value of the object passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算式會正常運作，不會變更物件傳遞給它的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性設定為指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Default" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Default" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性設定為指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a default vaule for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立代表指定類型的預設值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic division operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表算術除法運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property to.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property to.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic division operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表算術除法運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the division operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載除法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的除法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的除法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that divides divides its first argument by its second argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何建立一個除以除以運算式的第二個引數其第一個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The division operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 Division 運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic division operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表算術除法運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the division operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載除法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的除法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的除法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the division operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />, given an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> as the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> 做為第二個引數，建立 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The `addMethod` parameter must represent an instance method named "Add" (case insensitive).
trans-unit.target: `addMethod`參數必須代表名為"Add"（不區分大小寫） 的執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: The add method must have the same number of parameters as the number of elements in `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 加入方法必須有相同數量的參數中的項目數為`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of each element in `arguments` must be assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the add method, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的每個項目的`arguments`必須是指派給新增的方法，與對應參數的型別可能之後*用引號括住*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當對應的方法參數的類型是項目會用引號括<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ElementInit%28System.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29> method to create an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> that represents calling the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602.Add%2A> method to initialize an element of a dictionary collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ElementInit%28System.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29>方法來建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602.Add%2A>方法來初始化字典集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="addMethod" /> or <paramref name="arguments" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> 或 <paramref name="arguments" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents is not named "Add" (case insensitive).
trans-unit.target: 未將 <paramref name="addMethod" /> 所代表的方法命名為 "Add" (不區分大小寫)。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents is not an instance method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> 所代表的方法不是執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="arguments" /> does not contain the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 所包含的項目數與 <paramref name="addMethod" /> 所代表之方法的參數數目不同。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of one or more elements of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一或多個項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性無法指派給 <paramref name="addMethod" /> 所代表之方法的對應參數類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />, given an array of values as the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 指定值陣列做為第二個引數，建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.target: `addMethod`參數必須代表名為"Add"（不區分大小寫） 的執行個體方法。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的每個項目的`arguments`必須是指派給新增的方法，與對應參數的型別可能之後*用引號括住*。

trans-unit.target: 只有當對應的方法參數的類型是項目會用引號括<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ElementInit%28System.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29> method to create an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> that represents calling the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602.Add%2A> method to initialize an element of a dictionary collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ElementInit%28System.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29>方法來建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602.Add%2A>方法來初始化字典集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="addMethod" /> or <paramref name="arguments" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> 或 <paramref name="arguments" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The method that addMethod represents is not named "Add" (case insensitive).
trans-unit.target: addMethod 所表示的方法名稱不是 "Add" (不區分大小寫)。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The method that addMethod represents is not an instance method.
trans-unit.target: addMethod 所表示的方法不是執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
arguments does not contain the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method that addMethod represents.
trans-unit.target: 引數包含的項目數目與 addMethod 所表示之方法的參數數目不同。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of one or more elements of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一或多個項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性無法指派給 <paramref name="addMethod" /> 所代表之方法的對應參數類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty expression that has <see cref="T:System.Void" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有 <see cref="T:System.Void" /> 類型的空運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Default" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to <see cref="T:System.Void" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Default" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性設為 <see cref="T:System.Void" />。

trans-unit.source: An empty expression can be used where an expression is expected but no action is desired.
trans-unit.target: 必須是運算式，但不需要採取任何動作，可以使用空運算式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use an empty expression as the last expression in a block expression.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用空運算式做為最後一個運算式中的運算式區塊。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the block expression's return value is void.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，區塊運算式的傳回值為 void。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an empty expression and add it to a block expression.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立空的運算式，並將它加入區塊運算式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表相等比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表相等比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性一律為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the equality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載等號比較運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that checks whether the values of its two arguments are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立運算式，會檢查其兩個引數的值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The equality operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義等號比較運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />，<see langword="false" /> 則表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表相等比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性等於`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，兩者都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the equality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載等號比較運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the equality operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，且不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義等號比較運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="XOR" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 運算的 <see langword="XOR" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="XOR" /> operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> 作為使用者定義型別，建立表示位元 <see langword="XOR" /> 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the `XOR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載`XOR`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為整數或布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的結果型別`XOR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至預先定義的結果型別`XOR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents the logical XOR operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立運算式，代表邏輯 XOR 運算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XOR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 <see langword="XOR" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="XOR" /> operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> 作為使用者定義型別，建立表示位元 <see langword="XOR" /> 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the chosen implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定選取的實作作業的方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the `XOR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載`XOR`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為整數或布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的結果型別`XOR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至預先定義的結果型別`XOR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the <see langword="XOR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義類型 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的 <see langword="XOR" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise XOR assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表位元 XOR 指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise XOR assignment operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> 作為使用者定義型別，建立代表位元 XOR 指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOrAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOrAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise XOR assignment operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> 作為使用者定義型別，建立代表位元 XOR 指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOrAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOrAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise XOR assignment operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> 作為使用者定義型別，建立代表位元 XOR 指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOrAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOrAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表存取欄位的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), <c>expression</c> must be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 若為 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />)，<c>expression</c> 必須是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表存取欄位的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> property of `field`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等於<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>屬性`field`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="field" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="field" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The field represented by <paramref name="field" /> is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) and <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="field" /> 所表示的欄位不是 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />)，且 <paramref name="expression" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the field represented by <paramref name="field" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 無法指派給 <paramref name="field" /> 所代表之欄位的宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> contains a field named <c>fieldName</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 包含名為 <c>fieldName</c> 的欄位。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態欄位，可以是 Null。

trans-unit.source: The name of a field to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field given the name of the field.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，代表存取可指定欄位名稱的欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> that represents the field denoted by <paramref name="fieldName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="expression" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" />，代表 <paramref name="fieldName" /> 所表示的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> that represents the field denoted by `fieldName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等於<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>，代表所表示的欄位`fieldName`。

trans-unit.source: This method searches `expression`.Type and its base types for a field that has the name `fieldName`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋`expression`。類型和欄位名稱及其基底類型`fieldName`。

trans-unit.source: Public fields are given preference over non-public fields.
trans-unit.target: 公用欄位會給予喜好設定，在非公用欄位。

trans-unit.source: If a matching field is found, this method passes `expression` and the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> that represents that field to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到相符的欄位，這個方法會傳遞`expression`和<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>表示該欄位加入<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立代表存取欄位的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="fieldName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="fieldName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No field named <paramref name="fieldName" /> is defined in <paramref name="expression" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fieldName" />.Type 或其基底類型中沒有定義名為 <paramref name="expression" /> 的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The containing object of the field.
trans-unit.target: 欄位的包含物件。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態欄位，可以是 Null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: 包含欄位的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The field to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表存取欄位的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of up to sixteen <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that specify the type arguments for the <see langword="System.Action" /> delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 最多包含十六個 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的陣列，指定 <see langword="System.Action" /> 委派類型的類型引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents a generic <c>System.Action</c> delegate type that has specific type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件，這個物件代表具有特定型別引數的泛型 <c>System.Action</c> 委派類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of a <c>System.Action</c> delegate that has the specified type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <c>System.Action</c> 委派的類型，具有指定的型別引數。

trans-unit.source: As an example, if the elements of `typeArgs` represent the types `T1…Tn`, the resulting <xref:System.Type> object represents the constructed delegate type `System.Action<T1,…,Tn>` in C# or `System.Action(Of T1,…,Tn)` in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果的項目`typeArgs`代表類型`T1…Tn`，所產生的<xref:System.Type>物件代表建構的委派類型`System.Action<T1,…,Tn>`在 C# 或`System.Action(Of T1,…,Tn)`在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> contains more than sixteen elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 包含十六個以上的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type arguments of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 委派的型別引數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> object that represents a generic <c>System.Func</c> or <c>System.Action</c> delegate type that has specific type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 物件，這個物件代表具有特定型別引數的泛型 <c>System.Func</c> 或 <c>System.Action</c> 委派類型。

trans-unit.source: The delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 委派類型。

trans-unit.source: The last type argument determines the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個型別引數會決定委派的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If no Func or Action is large enough, it will generate a custom delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有函式或動作夠大，因此會產生自訂委派類型。

trans-unit.source: As with Func, the last argument is the return type.
trans-unit.target: 如同函式，最後一個引數是傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: It can be set to System.Void to produce an Action.
trans-unit.target: 它可以設定為 System.Void，產生動作。

trans-unit.source: An array of one to seventeen <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that specify the type arguments for the <see langword="System.Func" /> delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 包含一到十七個 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的陣列，指定 <see langword="System.Func" /> 委派類型的類型引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> object that represents a generic <c>System.Func</c> delegate type that has specific type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 物件，這個物件代表具有特定型別引數的泛型 <c>System.Func</c> 委派類型。

trans-unit.source: The last type argument specifies the return type of the created delegate.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個型別引數指定已建立之委派的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of a <c>System.Func</c> delegate that has the specified type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <c>System.Func</c> 委派的類型，具有指定的型別引數。

trans-unit.source: `typeArgs` must contain at least one and at most seventeen elements.
trans-unit.target: `typeArgs` 必須包含至少一個與最十七項目。

trans-unit.source: As an example, if the elements of `typeArgs` represent the types `T1…Tn`, the resulting <xref:System.Type> object represents the constructed delegate type `System.Func<T1,…,Tn>` in C# or `System.Func(Of T1,…,Tn)` in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果的項目`typeArgs`代表類型`T1…Tn`，所產生的<xref:System.Type>物件代表建構的委派類型`System.Func<T1,…,Tn>`在 C# 或`System.Func(Of T1,…,Tn)`在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> contains fewer than one or more than seventeen elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 包含少於一個或多過十七個項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a "go to" statement.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示 "go to" 陳述式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。
