trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 將跳躍的目標 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a "go to" statement.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示 "go to" 陳述式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Goto, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to the specified value, and a null value to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等於 Goto、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 屬性設定為指定的值，且包含在跳躍時傳遞至目標標籤的 Null 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that contains a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立包含的運算式<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 將跳躍的目標 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The value that will be passed to the associated label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: 將在跳躍時傳遞至關聯標籤的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a "go to" statement.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示 "go to" 陳述式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The value passed to the label upon jumping can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定跳躍時傳遞至標籤的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Goto, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to <paramref name="target" />, and <paramref name="value" /> to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等於 Goto、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="target" />，且，且包含在跳躍時傳遞至目標標籤的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 將跳躍的目標 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a "go to" statement with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，表示含指定之類型的 "go to" 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Goto, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to the specified value, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to <paramref name="type" />, and a null value to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等於 Goto、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 屬性設定為指定的值、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="type" />，且包含在跳躍時傳遞至目標標籤的 Null 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 將跳躍的目標 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The value that will be passed to the associated label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: 將在跳躍時傳遞至關聯標籤的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a "go to" statement with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，表示含指定之類型的 "go to" 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The value passed to the label upon jumping can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定跳躍時傳遞至標籤的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Goto, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to <paramref name="target" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to <paramref name="type" />, and <paramref name="value" /> to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等於 Goto、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="target" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="type" />，且包含在跳躍時傳遞至目標標籤的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「大於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「大於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性一律為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 大於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立會比較兩個整數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The "greater than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義「大於」運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />，<see langword="false" /> 則表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「大於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性等於`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，兩者都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation :
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 大於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "greater than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，且不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義「大於」運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「大於或等於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「大於或等於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性一律為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers.

trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "greater than or equal" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的「大於或等於」運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that represents a conditional block with an <see langword="if" /> statement.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />，代表具有 <see langword="if" /> 陳述式的條件區塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />, properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> property is set to default expression and the type of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> returned by this method is <see cref="T:System.Void" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> 屬性已設定為預設運算式，而這個方法傳回之結果 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> 的類型為 <see cref="T:System.Void" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a conditional block.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立表示條件式區塊的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that represents a conditional block with <see langword="if" /> and <see langword="else" /> statements.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />，代表具有 <see langword="if" /> 和 <see langword="else" /> 陳述式的條件區塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> returned by this method is <see cref="T:System.Void" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回之結果 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> 的類型為 <see cref="T:System.Void" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the incrementing of the expression value by 1.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，表示運算式值遞增 1。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to increment.
trans-unit.target: 要遞增的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the incrementing of the expression value by 1.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，表示運算式值遞增 1。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the incremented expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示遞增後運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: This expression is functional and does not change the value of the object that is passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算式會正常運作，不會變更的物件傳遞給它的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents an increment operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立運算式，表示遞增作業。

trans-unit.target: 表示實作方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the incrementing of the expression by 1.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the incremented expression.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the delegate or lambda expression to be applied to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，代表要套用的委派或 Lambda 運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that represent the arguments that the delegate or lambda expression is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，代表要套用委派或 Lambda 運算式的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" /> that applies a delegate or lambda expression to a list of argument expressions.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" />，將委派或 Lambda 運算式套用至引數運算式清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" /> that applies the specified delegate or lambda expression to the provided arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" />，可將指定的委派或 Lambda 運算式套用至所提供的引數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression> represents the return type of the delegate that is represented by `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>代表委派所表示的傳回型別`expression`。型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression> is empty if `arguments` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Arguments%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>是空的如果`arguments`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments` except that some of these <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> objects may be *quoted*.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就會包含相同項目，做為`arguments`除外，其中有些<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>物件可能*加上引號*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding parameter of the delegate represented by `expression` is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當對應委派的參數所代表項目會用引號括`expression`的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Invoke%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29> method to create an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression> that represents the invocation of a lambda expression with specified arguments.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 不代表委派類型或 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1" />。

The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the delegate represented by <paramref name="expression" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="arguments" /> does not contain the same number of elements as the list of parameters for the delegate represented by <paramref name="expression" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an expression tree that represents a lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示 Lambda 運算式的運算式樹狀架構。

trans-unit.source: Creates a LambdaExpression by first constructing a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 首先透過建構委派類型來建立 LambdaExpression。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> property equal to Lambda and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 Lambda，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 集合之 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.target: 首先透過建構委派類型來建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The `parameters` parameter must not have more than sixteen elements.
trans-unit.target: `parameters`參數不能超過 16 個項目。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in `body`.
trans-unit.target: 項目`parameters`必須是參考參數運算式中等於`body`。

trans-unit.source: This method constructs an appropriate delegate type from one of the `System.Func` generic delegates.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建構其中一個適當的委派類型`System.Func`泛型委派。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the delegate type to one of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda> factory methods to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將委派類型的其中一個<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda>factory 方法，來建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="body" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="body" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more elements of <paramref name="parameters" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 的一個或多個項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameters" /> contains more than sixteen elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 包含十六個以上的項目。

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates if tail call optimization will be applied when compiling the created expression.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，其代表編譯所建立的運算式時，是否會套用 tail 呼叫最佳化。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" />。

trans-unit.source: The name for the lambda.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Used for emitting debug information.
trans-unit.target: 用於發出偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents a delegate signature for the lambda.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，代表 Lambda 的委派簽章。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> by first constructing a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 首先透過建構委派類型來建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: It can be used when the delegate type is not known at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 它可用於在編譯階段不知道委派類型時。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a lambda expression which has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 表示 lambda 運算式的物件，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The object that is returned from this function is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 從這個函數傳回的物件屬於類型<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression> type is used to represent the returned object because the concrete type of the lambda expression is not known at compile time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression>類型用來代表傳回的物件，因為 lambda 運算式的具象型別不在編譯時期已知。

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters for the delegate type represented by`delegateType` must equal the length of `parameters`.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的委派類型的參數數目`delegateType`必須等於長度`parameters`。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in `body`.
trans-unit.target: 項目`parameters`必須是參考參數運算式中等於`body`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting object is equal to `delegateType`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生的物件等於`delegateType`。

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` is `null`, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters%2A> property of the resulting object is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parameters`是`null`、<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters%2A>產生物件的屬性是空的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a lambda expression that adds 1 to the passed argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立代表增加 1 傳遞的引數的 lambda 運算式的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegateType" /> or <paramref name="body" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 或 <paramref name="body" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more elements in <paramref name="parameters" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 中的一個或多個項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegateType" /> does not represent a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 不表示委派類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="body" />.Type represents a type that is not assignable to the return type of the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="body" />.Type 表示的類型無法指派給 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示之委派類型的傳回類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="parameters" /> does not contain the same number of elements as the list of parameters for the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 包含的項目數與 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示之委派類型的參數清單不同。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="parameters" /> is not assignable from the type of the corresponding parameter type of the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 之項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性無法從由 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示之委派類型的對應參數類型指派。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents a delegate signature for the lambda.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，代表 Lambda 的委派簽章。

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters for the delegate type represented by `delegateType` must equal the length of `parameters`.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的委派類型的參數數目`delegateType`必須等於長度`parameters`。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in `body`.
trans-unit.target: 項目`parameters`必須是參考參數運算式中等於`body`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting object is equal to `delegateType`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生的物件等於`delegateType`。

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` is `null`, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters%2A> property of the resulting object is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parameters`是`null`、<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters%2A>產生物件的屬性是空的集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegateType" /> or <paramref name="body" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 或 <paramref name="body" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more elements in <paramref name="parameters" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 中的一個或多個項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegateType" /> does not represent a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 不表示委派類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="body" />.Type represents a type that is not assignable to the return type of the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="body" />.Type 表示的類型無法指派給 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示之委派類型的傳回類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="parameters" /> does not contain the same number of elements as the list of parameters for the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 包含的項目數與 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示之委派類型的參數清單不同。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="parameters" /> is not assignable from the type of the corresponding parameter type of the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 之項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性無法從由 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示之委派類型的對應參數類型指派。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" />。

trans-unit.source: The name for the lambda.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Used for emitting debug information.
trans-unit.target: 用於發出偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates if tail call optimization will be applied when compiling the created expression.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，其代表編譯所建立的運算式時，是否會套用 tail 呼叫最佳化。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a LambdaExpression by first constructing a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 首先透過建構委派類型來建立 LambdaExpression。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> property equal to Lambda and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 Lambda，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> representing the delegate signature for the lambda.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />，代表 Lambda 的委派簽章。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates if tail call optimization will be applied when compiling the created expression.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，其代表編譯所建立的運算式時，是否會套用 tail 呼叫最佳化。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元左移 (Left-Shift) 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元左移 (Left-Shift) 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShift" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShift" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the left-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載左移位運算子<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。類型是整數類資料類型 (其中<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或對應可為 null 的類型) 和`right`。型別是<xref:System.Int32>、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined left-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的左移位運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined left-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的左移位運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The left-shift operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type. 定義 Left-shift 運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元左移 (Left-Shift) 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShift" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShift" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the left-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載左移位運算子<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。類型是整數類資料類型 (其中<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或對應可為 null 的類型) 和`right`。型別是<xref:System.Int32>、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。
