trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的左移位運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined left-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的左移位運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the left-shift operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 且不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 Left-shift 運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元左移位指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元左移位指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShiftAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShiftAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元左移位指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShiftAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShiftAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元左移位指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShiftAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShiftAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "less than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「小於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "less than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「小於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThan" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThan" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性一律為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 作業的實作方法是選擇根據下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 小於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立會比較兩個整數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The "less than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義「小於」運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />，<see langword="false" /> 則表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "less than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「小於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThan" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThan" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性等於`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，兩者都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 小於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "less than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的「小於」運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a " less than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「小於或等於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a " less than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「小於或等於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性一律為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than or equal" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 小於或等於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立會比較兩個整數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The "less than or equal" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義「小於或等於」運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />，<see langword="false" /> 則表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "less than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表「小於或等於」數值比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性等於`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，兩者都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than or equal" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 小於或等於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "less than or equal" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，且不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義「小於或等於」運算子。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberListBinding" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberListBinding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> that represents a field or property to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />，表示要將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的欄位或屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberListBinding.Initializers" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberListBinding.Initializers" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more elements of <paramref name="initializers" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 的一個或多個項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> does not represent a field or property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 不代表欄位或屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType" /> or <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType" /> of the field or property that <paramref name="member" /> represents does not implement <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> that represents a field or property to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />，表示要將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的欄位或屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberListBinding.Initializers" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> 集合之 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberListBinding.Initializers" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberListBinding" /> where the member is a field or property.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> that uses specified <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> objects to initialize a collection.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`newExpression`必須代表實作的型別<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>等於`newExpression`。型別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit%5B%5D%29> method to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> that represents the initialization of a new dictionary instance with two key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit%5B%5D%29>方法來建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>，表示具有兩個索引鍵-值組的新字典執行個體初始化。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One or more elements of <paramref name="initializers" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 的一個或多個項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type 未實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.NewExpression" /> property equal to.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> that uses a method named "Add" to add elements to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" />，其使用名為 "Add" 的方法將項目加入集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ListInit" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.NewExpression" /> property set to the specified value.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `newExpression` must represent a type that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性`newExpression`必須代表實作的型別<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: In order to use this overload of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7D%29>, `newExpression`.Type or its base type must declare a single method named "Add" (case insensitive) that takes exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的這個多載<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7D%29>， `newExpression`。型別或其基底類型必須宣告名為"Add"（不區分大小寫） 會採用一個引數的單一方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the argument must be assignable from the type represented by the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the first element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: 引數的型別必須可從所代表的類型<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性的第一個項目的`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> contains one element of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> for each element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>包含一個項目類型的<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit>每個項目`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> is a singleton collection that contains the corresponding element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A>屬性的每個項目<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>是包含的對應元素的單一集合`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> represents the add method that was discovered on `newExpression`.Type or its base type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod%2A>屬性的每個項目<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>代表探索到的 add 方法`newExpression`。型別或其基底類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> is equal to `newExpression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>等於`newExpression`。型別。

trans-unit.source: There is no instance method named "Add" (case insensitive) declared in <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type or its base type.

trans-unit.source: -or-

The type represented by the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of the first element of <paramref name="initializers" /> is not assignable to the argument type of the add method on <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type or its base type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" />的第一個項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性所代表的型別，無法指派給 <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type 或其基底型別上的 add 方法的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
More than one argument-compatible method named "Add" (case-insensitive) exists on <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type and/or its base type.
trans-unit.target: 多個名為 "Add" (不區分大小寫) 的引數相容方法存在於 <paramref name="newExpression" /> .Type 和/或其基底型別。

trans-unit.target: 若要使用的這個多載<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29>， `newExpression`。型別或其基底類型必須宣告名為"Add"（不區分大小寫） 會採用一個引數的單一方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the argument must be assignable from the type represented by the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the first element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: 引數的型別必須可從所代表的類型<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性的第一個項目的`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> contains one element of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> for each element of `initializers`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> is a singleton collection that contains the corresponding element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A>屬性的每個項目<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>是包含的對應元素的單一集合`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> represents the add method that was discovered on `newExpression`.Type or its base type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod%2A>屬性的每個項目<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>代表探索到的 add 方法`newExpression`。型別或其基底類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> is equal to `newExpression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>等於`newExpression`。型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> that specifies the type of binary operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" />，指定二進位運算的類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the left operand.
trans-unit.target: 代表左運算元的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the right operand.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />, given the left and right operands, by calling an appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 透過呼叫適當的 Factory 方法來建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，指定左運算元和右運算元。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that results from calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，由呼叫適當的 Factory 方法所產生。

trans-unit.source: The `binaryType` parameter determines which <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> factory method this method calls.
trans-unit.target: `binaryType`參數可決定哪些<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>factory 方法，這個方法會呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `binaryType` is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract>, this method invokes <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Subtract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`binaryType`是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract>，這個方法會叫用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Subtract%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeBinary%28System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> that represents the subtraction of one number from another.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />，<see langword="false" /> 則表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />, given the left operand, right operand and implementing method, by calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 透過呼叫適當的 Factory 方法來建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，指定左運算元、右運算元和實作方法。

trans-unit.source: The `binaryType` parameter determines which <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> factory method this method will call.
trans-unit.target: `binaryType`參數可決定哪些<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>factory 方法，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `binaryType` is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract>, this method invokes <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Subtract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`binaryType`是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract>，這個方法會叫用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Subtract%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `liftToNull` and `method` parameters are ignored if the appropriate factory method does not have a corresponding parameter.
trans-unit.target: `liftToNull`和`method`參數都會被忽略，如果適當的 factory 方法，並沒有對應的參數。
