The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the constructor that <paramref name="constructor" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性無法指派給 <paramref name="constructor" /> 所代表之建構函式的對應參數類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="members" /> parameter does not have the same number of elements as <paramref name="arguments" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="members" /> 參數的項目數與 <paramref name="arguments" /> 的不同。

trans-unit.source: -or-

An element of <paramref name="arguments" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property that represents a type that is not assignable to the type of the member that is represented by the corresponding element of <paramref name="members" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的項目有 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性，它表示無法指派給 <paramref name="members" /> 其對應項目所表示成員類型的類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that represents creating an array that has a specified rank.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其代表建立具有指定之陣序的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the element type of the array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，代表陣列的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that represents creating an array that has a specified rank.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其代表建立具有指定之陣序的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayBounds" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayBounds" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression> represents an array type whose rank is equal to the length of `bounds` and whose element type is `type`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression>代表其次序等於長度的陣列類型`bounds`和其項目類型是`type`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of each element of `bounds` must represent an integral type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性的每個項目`bounds`必須代表整數類型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A> method to create an expression tree that represents creating a string array that has a rank of 2.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A>方法來建立運算式樹狀結構表示的字串陣列建立擁有等級為 2。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="bounds" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 或 <paramref name="bounds" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="bounds" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bounds" /> 的項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="bounds" /> does not represent an integral type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bounds" /> 之項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性不表示整數類資料類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the element type of the array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，代表陣列的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合之 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that represents creating an array that has a specified rank.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其代表建立具有指定之陣序的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayBounds" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayBounds" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression> represents an array type whose rank is equal to the length of `bounds` and whose element type is `type`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression>代表其次序等於長度的陣列類型`bounds`和其項目類型是`type`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of each element of `bounds` must represent an integral type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性的每個項目`bounds`必須代表整數類型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A> method to create an expression tree that represents creating a string array that has a rank of 2.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A>方法來建立運算式樹狀結構表示的字串陣列建立擁有等級為 2。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="bounds" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 或 <paramref name="bounds" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="bounds" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bounds" /> 的項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="bounds" /> does not represent an integral type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bounds" /> 之項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性不表示整數類資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that represents creating a one-dimensional array and initializing it from a list of elements.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其代表建立一維陣列，並從項目清單將此陣列初始化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the element type of the array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，代表陣列的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that represents creating a one-dimensional array and initializing it from a list of elements.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其代表建立一維陣列，並從項目清單將此陣列初始化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayInit" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayInit" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of each element of `initializers` must represent a type that is assignable to the type represented by `type`, possibly after it is *quoted*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性的每個項目`initializers`必須代表指派給所代表之類型的型別`type`，可能是它之後*加上引號*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if `type` is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當項目會用引號括`type`是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression> represents an array type whose rank is 1 and whose element type is `type`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression>代表陣列類型，其次序為 1，其項目類型為`type`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A> method to create an expression tree that represents creating a one-dimensional string array that is initialized with a list of string expressions.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>方法來建立運算式樹狀架構代表建立一維字串陣列，初始化字串運算式的清單。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="initializers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 或 <paramref name="initializers" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="initializers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 的項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="initializers" /> represents a type that is not assignable to the type that <paramref name="type" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 之項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性所表示的類型無法指派給 <paramref name="type" /> 所表示的類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the element type of the array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，代表陣列的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用以填入 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合之 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that represents creating a one-dimensional array and initializing it from a list of elements.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其代表建立一維陣列，並從項目清單將此陣列初始化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayInit" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayInit" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of each element of `initializers` must represent a type that is assignable to the type represented by `type`, possibly after it is *quoted*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性的每個項目`initializers`必須代表指派給所代表之類型的型別`type`，可能是它之後*加上引號*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if `type` is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當項目會用引號括`type`是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 引號的表示項目包裝在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: 產生的節點是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>屬性則是項目`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression> represents an array type whose rank is 1 and whose element type is `type`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression>代表陣列類型，其次序為 1，其項目類型為`type`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A> method to create an expression tree that represents creating a one-dimensional string array that is initialized with a list of string expressions.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>方法來建立運算式樹狀架構代表建立一維字串陣列，初始化字串運算式的清單。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="initializers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 或 <paramref name="initializers" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="initializers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 的項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="initializers" /> represents a type that is not assignable to the type <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 之項目的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 屬性所表示的類型無法指派給 <paramref name="type" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the node type of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的節點類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> property provides a more specialized description of an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> than just its derived type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>屬性提供的更具特製化的描述<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>比只是其衍生的類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> can be used to represent many different kinds of binary expressions, such as a division operation or a "greater than" operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>無法用來代表許多不同種類的二進位運算式，例如除法運算或 「 大於 」 作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> property would describe these binary expressions as <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>屬性會描述這些二進位運算式做為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan>分別。

trans-unit.source: The static CLR type of the expression that the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> object represents is represented by the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的靜態的 CLR 型別，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>物件代表由<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise complement operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元補數運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise complement operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元補數運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary not operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型是使用者定義的類型定義、 not 運算子的一元<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示的運算子是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric or Boolean type, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`expression`。類型是數值或布林值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作的方法引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `expression`.類型為 null 的實值類型，而且對應的非 null 的型別等於實作之方法的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`，節點的類型是`expression`。型別。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型為非 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否則，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a logical NOT operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立運算式，表示 邏輯 NOT 運算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The unary not operator is not defined for <paramref name="expression" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 定義一元 NOT 運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise complement operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元補數運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法可加以指定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用一個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary not operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型是使用者定義的類型定義、 not 運算子的一元<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示的運算子是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`expression`。類型是數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作的方法引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `expression`.類型為 null 的實值類型，而且對應的非可為 null 的實值類型等於實作之方法的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`，節點的類型是`expression`。型別。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。類型為非 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否則，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且其代表的方法傳回的是 <see langword="void" />，不是 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者使用的引數不是剛好一個。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the unary not operator is not defined for <paramref name="expression" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，且不會為 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 定義一元 NOT 運算子。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="expression" />.Type (or its corresponding non-nullable type if it is a nullable value type) is not assignable to the argument type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type (如果它是可為 Null 的實質類型，則為其對應之不可為 Null 的類型) 無法指派給 <paramref name="method" /> 所代表之方法的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表不相等比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表不相等比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 屬性一律為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the inequality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載不等比較運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義不等比較運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />，<see langword="false" /> 則表示將 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表不相等比較的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>屬性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性等於`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，兩者都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the inequality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載不等比較運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型可為 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the inequality operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 運算的 <see langword="OR" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Or" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.

trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`OR`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為整數或布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的結果類型是預先定義之位元`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應的結果類型的預先定義的位元`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`OR`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為整數或布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的結果類型是預先定義之位元`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應的結果類型的預先定義的位元`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的位元 <see langword="OR" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise OR assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元 OR 指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise OR assignment operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立表示位元 OR 指派運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="OR" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operator evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示只在第一個運算子評估為 <see langword="OR" /> 時才評估第二個運算元的條件 <see langword="false" /> 運算。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="OR" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示只在第一個運算元計算結果為 <see langword="OR" /> 時才求第二個運算元之值的 <see langword="false" /> 條件運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrElse" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrElse" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`OR`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `OR` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 條件式`OR`運算子無法多載以 C# 或 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `OR` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 不過，條件式`OR`運算子會評估使用位元`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `OR` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用者定義的多載的位元`OR`運算子可以是這種節點類型的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別是布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，而且對應不可為 null 的型別等於對應的實作方法的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為相同的布林型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的條件式的結果型別`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至預先定義的條件式的結果型別`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a logical `OR` operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立代表邏輯運算式`OR`第一個運算元判斷值為時，才評估第二個運算元的作業`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義位元 <see langword="OR" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 是不相同的布林類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="OR" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示只在第一個運算元計算結果為 <see langword="OR" /> 時才求第二個運算元之值的 <see langword="false" /> 條件運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrElse" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrElse" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`OR`運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `OR` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 條件式`OR`運算子無法多載以 C# 或 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `OR` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 不過，條件式`OR`運算子會評估使用位元`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `OR` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用者定義的多載的位元`OR`運算子可以是這種節點類型的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別是布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，而且對應不可為 null 的型別等於對應的實作方法的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為相同的布林型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的條件式的結果型別`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至預先定義的條件式的結果型別`OR`運算子。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的位元 <see langword="OR" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是相同的布林類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node that can be used to identify a parameter or a variable in an expression tree.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 節點，此節點可用以識別運算式樹狀結構中的參數或變數。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter or variable.
trans-unit.target: 參數或變數的類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node that can be used to identify a parameter or a variable in an expression tree.

trans-unit.target: 建立含指定之名稱和類型的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 節點。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>物件的值列印<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter or variable.
trans-unit.target: 參數或變數的類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter or variable, used for debugging or printing purpose only.
trans-unit.target: 參數或變數的名稱，僅供偵錯或列印之用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node that can be used to identify a parameter or a variable in an expression tree.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 節點，此節點可用以識別運算式樹狀結構中的參數或變數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Parameter" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression.Name" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the assignment of the expression followed by a subsequent decrement by 1 of the original expression.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the assignment of the expression followed by a subsequent decrement by 1 of the original expression.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the assignment of the expression followed by a subsequent decrement by 1 of the original expression.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the assignment of the expression followed by a subsequent increment by 1 of the original expression.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to apply the operations on.
trans-unit.target: 要套用上述作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 表示實作方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the assignment of the expression followed by a subsequent increment by 1 of the original expression.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising a number to a power.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表將數字提升為乘冪數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising a number to a power.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表將數字提升為乘冪數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Power" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
