trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the exponentiation operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的乘冪運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both <xref:System.Double>, the implementing method is <xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都<xref:System.Double>、 實作方法是<xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The exponentiation operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 Exponentiation 運算子。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="left" />.Type and/or <paramref name="right" />.Type are not <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 (或) <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising a number to a power.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表將數字提升為乘冪數的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Power" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Power" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the exponentiation operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的乘冪運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both <xref:System.Double>, the implementing method is <xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都<xref:System.Double>、 實作方法是<xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the exponentiation operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的乘冪運算子。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="left" />.Type and/or <paramref name="right" />.Type are not <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" /> 和 <paramref name="left" />.Type，且/或 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising an expression to a power and assigning the result back to the expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示將運算式自乘為乘冪，並且將結果指派回運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising an expression to a power and assigning the result back to the expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示將運算式自乘為乘冪，並且將結果指派回運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.PowerAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.PowerAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising an expression to a power and assigning the result back to the expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示將運算式自乘為乘冪，並且將結果指派回運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising an expression to a power and assigning the result back to the expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，表示將運算式自乘為乘冪，並且將結果指派回運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.PowerAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.PowerAssign" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that decrements the expression by 1 and assigns the result back to the expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，可讓運算式遞減 1，並將結果指派回運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to apply the operations on.
trans-unit.target: 要套用上述作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that decrements the expression by 1 and assigns the result back to the expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，可讓運算式遞減 1，並將結果指派回運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents the resultant expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示結果運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to apply the operations on.
trans-unit.target: 要套用上述作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 表示實作方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that decrements the expression by 1 and assigns the result back to the expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，可讓運算式遞減 1，並將結果指派回運算式。

trans-unit.target: 要套用上述作業的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表存取屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態屬性，可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents a property accessor method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />，代表屬性存取子方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property by using a property accessor method.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，代表透過使用屬性存取方法來存取屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property accessed in <paramref name="propertyAccessor" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="expression" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />，代表在 <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> 中存取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等於<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the method represented by `propertyAccessor` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), `expression` can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果所代表的方法`propertyAccessor`是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，`expression`可以`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The method that <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> represents is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) and <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> 所表示的方法不是 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />)，且 <paramref name="expression" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by <paramref name="propertyAccessor" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 無法指派給 <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> 所代表之方法的宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The method that <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> represents is not a property accessor method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyAccessor" /> 所表示的方法不是屬性存取子方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態屬性，可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表存取屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等於<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the property represented by `property` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), `expression` can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性以表示`property`是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，`expression`可以`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="property" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="property" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The property that <paramref name="property" /> represents is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) and <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="property" /> 所表示的屬性不是 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />)，且 <paramref name="expression" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the property that <paramref name="property" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 無法指派給 <paramref name="property" /> 所表示屬性的宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> contains a property named <c>propertyName</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 包含名為 <c>propertyName</c> 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" /> for static properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態屬性，可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of a property to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表存取屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property denoted by <paramref name="propertyName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="expression" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />，代表 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 所表示的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> that represents the property denoted by `propertyName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等於<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>，代表所表示的屬性`propertyName`。

trans-unit.source: This method searches `expression`.Type and its base types for a property that has the name `propertyName`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋`expression`。型別和屬性名稱及其基底類型`propertyName`。

trans-unit.source: Public properties are given preference over non-public properties.
trans-unit.target: 公用屬性會給予喜好設定，透過非公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a matching property is found, this method passes `expression` and the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> that represents that property to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到相符的屬性，這個方法會傳遞`expression`和<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>代表該屬性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an expression that represents accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立代表存取屬性的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="propertyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No property named <paramref name="propertyName" /> is defined in <paramref name="expression" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyName" />.Type 或其基底類型中沒有定義名為 <paramref name="expression" /> 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 屬性所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the property is static/shared, it must be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性為靜態/共用屬性，就必須為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property to index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />，代表要編製索引的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that are used to index the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，用於對屬性進行索引。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> representing the access to an indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />，表示索引之屬性的存取結果。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 屬性所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the property is static/shared, it must be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性為靜態/共用屬性，就必須為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property to index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />，代表要編製索引的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that are used to index the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 物件的陣列，用於對屬性進行索引。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> representing the access to an indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />，表示索引之屬性的存取結果。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 屬性所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the property is static/shared, it must be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性為靜態/共用屬性，就必須為 null。

trans-unit.source: The name of the indexer.
trans-unit.target: 索引子的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that are used to index the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 物件的陣列，用於對屬性進行索引。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> representing the access to an indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />，表示索引之屬性的存取結果。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The containing object of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的包含物件。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態屬性，可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> that contains the property.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The property to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 建立用於存取屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> contains a property or field named <c>propertyOrFieldName</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 包含名為 <c>propertyOrFieldName</c> 的屬性或欄位。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static members.
trans-unit.target: 如果是靜態成員，可以是 Null。

trans-unit.source: The name of a property or field to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要存取之屬性或欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property or field.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，代表存取屬性或欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> or <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> that represents the property or field denoted by <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 屬性設定為 <paramref name="expression" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" />，代表 <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" /> 所表示的屬性或欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> or <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>, respectively, that represents the property or field denoted by `propertyOrFieldName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等於<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>或<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>，分別表示屬性或欄位以表示`propertyOrFieldName`。

trans-unit.source: This method searches `expression`.Type and its base types for a property or field that has the name `propertyOrFieldName`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會搜尋`expression`。類型和其屬性或欄位名稱的基底型別`propertyOrFieldName`。

trans-unit.source: Public properties and fields are given preference over non-public properties and fields.
trans-unit.target: 公用屬性和欄位的偏好進入非公用屬性和欄位。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties are given preference over fields.
trans-unit.target: 此外，屬性會偏好在欄位。

trans-unit.source: If a matching property or field is found, this method passes `expression` and the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> or <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> that represents that property or field to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到相符的屬性或欄位，這個方法會傳遞`expression`和<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>或<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>代表該屬性或欄位至<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>分別。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an expression that represents accessing a property or field.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立代表存取屬性或欄位的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No property or field named <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" /> is defined in <paramref name="expression" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" />.Type 或其基底類型中沒有定義名為 <paramref name="expression" /> 的屬性或欄位。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents an expression that has a constant value of type <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，代表具有 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 類型常數值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> represents the constructed type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>, where the type argument is the type represented by `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>代表建構的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>，其中型別引數是所代表的類型`expression`。型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reduces this node to a simpler expression.
trans-unit.target: 將這個節點精簡為更簡單的運算式。

trans-unit.source: If CanReduce returns true, this should return a valid expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanReduce 傳回 true，則應該傳回有效的運算式。

trans-unit.source: This method can return another node which itself must be reduced.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以傳回其他本身必須精簡的節點。

trans-unit.source: The reduced expression.
trans-unit.target: 精簡的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Reduces this node to a simpler expression.
trans-unit.target: 將這個節點精簡為更簡單的運算式。

trans-unit.source: If CanReduce returns true, this should return a valid expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanReduce 傳回 true，則應該傳回有效的運算式。

trans-unit.source: This method can return another node which itself must be reduced.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以傳回其他本身必須精簡的節點。

trans-unit.source: The reduced expression.
trans-unit.target: 精簡的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Reduce, this method checks that the reduced node satisfies certain invariants.
trans-unit.target: 不同於減少，這個方法會檢查縮減的節點滿足特定的非變異值。

trans-unit.source: Reduces the expression to a known node type (that is not an Extension node) or just returns the expression if it is already a known type.
trans-unit.target: 將運算式精簡為已知的節點類型 (不是 Extension 節點)，如果已經是已知的類型，則僅傳回運算式。

trans-unit.source: The reduced expression.
trans-unit.target: 精簡的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a rethrowing of an exception.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，表示重新擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a rethrowing of an exception.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，表示重新擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a rethrowing of an exception.
trans-unit.target: 表示重新擲回例外狀況的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的新 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a rethrowing of an exception with a given type.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise right-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表位元右移 (Right-Shift) 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise right-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表位元右移 (Right-Shift) 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載向右移位運算子<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。類型是整數類資料類型 (其中<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或對應可為 null 的類型) 和`right`。型別是<xref:System.Int32>、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的向右移位運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的向右移位運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The right-shift operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 Right-shift 運算子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise right-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立代表位元右移 (Right-Shift) 運算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載向右移位運算子<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。類型是整數類資料類型 (其中<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或對應可為 null 的類型) 和`right`。型別是<xref:System.Int32>、 實作方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的向右移位運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic subtraction operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表不含溢位檢查的算術減法運算。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic subtraction operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表不含溢位檢查的算術減法運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載減法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的減法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的減法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that subtracts the argument from the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立減去第一個引數的引數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The subtraction operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定義 Subtraction 運算子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 屬性設定為與之相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic subtraction operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其代表不含溢位檢查的算術減法運算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性等於 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 屬性設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>屬性設定為實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性設定為節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點已消除，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>屬性都`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它們是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 屬性為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 實作的方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載減法運算子，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示方法是實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 節點型別和已消除或非消除

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果實作的方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型是預先定義的減法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的減法運算子的結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而它所代表的方法會傳回 <see langword="void" />、不是 <see langword="static" /> (Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Shared" />)，或者未確切採用兩個引數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the subtraction operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，而且未定義 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 的減法運算子。
